author: dothebender1101
text: Put them temporarily ahead of a former WC finalist and marked a huge moment in Canadian football. Did plenty.

author: phantasybm

author: dragonslayermaster84
text: Or I could say it about a team eliminated in their first two matches. Which I did.

author: [deleted]
text:
>Put them temporarily ahead of a former WC finalist

In a world of football that really doesn't mean much. It's not rare that a better team loses a game over one unlucky ball getting into a goal. You on the other hand weren't a better team, not even closely, and the result proves that clearly

author: dothebender1101
text: No one is pretending they were the better team today. But who cares? They scored their first WC goal, against a far better team, in their second-ever WC. Gotta start somewhere.

author: [deleted]
text: We came up 3rd on our first ever world cup. Just saying

author: dothebender1101
text: And yet, still tied with Canada on WC wins

author: [deleted]
text: Along with 95% of the planet, yes. Hush now, see you in 4 years or whatever

author: dothebender1101
text: Haha all in good fun. Your midfield is elite and I've always loved watching Modric. Good luck to them.

author: [deleted]
text: God, why do you guys have to be so nice? It's not even fun being mean and salty around you :/
